code:
%% C4 Context diagram: System-level view showing external actors and systems
%% This is the highest zoom level in the C4 model
%% Shows who uses the system and what external systems it depends on

C4Context
    title Internet Banking System - Context

    %% People who interact with the system
    Person(customer, "Banking Customer", "Views account balances and makes payments")
    Person(support, "Support Staff", "Handles customer queries")

    %% The system under design
    System(bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to manage accounts online")

    %% External systems the banking system depends on
    System_Ext(emailSystem, "Email System", "Sends transactional emails")
    System_Ext(coreBank, "Core Banking System", "Stores account and transaction data")

    %% Relationships between actors and systems
    Rel(customer, bankingSystem, "Uses", "HTTPS")
    Rel(support, bankingSystem, "Administers", "HTTPS")
    Rel(bankingSystem, emailSystem, "Sends emails via", "SMTP")
    Rel(bankingSystem, coreBank, "Reads/writes accounts", "REST API")

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 customer, "Banking Customer", "Views account balances and makes payments" 和 support, "Support Staff", "Handles customer queries"。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'customer, "Banking Customer", "Views account balances and makes payments" 和 support, "Support Staff", "Handles customer queries"'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to manage accounts online" 和 emailSystem, "Email System", "Sends transactional emails" 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to manage accounts online" 和 emailSystem, "Email System", "Sends transactional emails"'。
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 coreBank, "Core Banking System", "Stores account and transaction data" 和 customer, bankingSystem, "Uses", "HTTPS" 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'coreBank, "Core Banking System", "Stores account and transaction data" 和 customer, bankingSystem, "Uses", "HTTPS"'。
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 support, bankingSystem, "Administers", "HTTPS" 和 bankingSystem, emailSystem, "Sends emails via", "SMTP"。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 support, bankingSystem, "Administers", "HTTPS"处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'support, bankingSystem, "Administers", "HTTPS"处理'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 bankingSystem, coreBank, "Reads/writes accounts", "REST API" 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'bankingSystem, coreBank, "Reads/writes accounts", "REST API"'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
